title.rendered: Expert Tips For Rocking Your Handshake Virtual Career Fair

content.rendered:
On September 15, a team of Handshake experts led a webinar training about how to attend a virtual career fair. If you were unable to join the webinar, or just starting to plan your first fair, we’ve got you! Watch the training below to learn how to rock your first virtual fair and get hired remotely.

You can reference the presentation slides here or use the links below to jump to specific topics in the training:

Introduction (3:47)
Benefits of Virtual Fairs (7:29)
5 Steps to Success at Virtual Fairs (9:06)
Updating Your Handshake Profile (13:10)
Updating Your Resume (22:06)
Exploring Virtual Events on Handshake (24:12)
Signing Up for Virtual Fair Sessions (26:01)
Accessing Your Virtual Fair Schedule (41:22)
Q&A (46:57)
More Virtual Fair Resources (1:00:00)
Important Reminders (1:00:20)

If you want to feel even more equipped for virtual fairs, don’t forget to prep your elevator pitch in advance, craft your resume to upload into Handshake, and prepare for one-on-one sessions with recruiters. And be sure to follow us on Instagram for daily tips, employer highlights, and new how-to videos!

Visit our Virtual Career Fair blog series for more expert tips for rocking your Handshake virtual career fair.
